title: LvL 6 mastery lost
body: I got a lvl 6 mastery with {{champion:267}} , after the match i got the "you unlocked lvl 6 mastery" and all, but then when i go to hextec crafting, its not there :S

replies.body: I took at look at this for you and saw that level 5 was achieved about a week ago, and wasn't able to find any issues that would have prevented you from earning a token.  The unlock messaging you received seems to be the introduction to mastery tokens.  When you get a chance, check out the[ Champion Mastery Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) and let me know if you have any questions!
Did you receive the S rank in the same game you level Nami to 5?
